title: California Community Colleges - Enroll Today | Home
body:
Looking for the I Can Afford College, A Degree With a Guarantee or California Community Colleges Career Education websites?
We’ve made it easier for you to get the same information and resources, now all in one place, on our new website ICanGoToCollege.com. Visit the new site to learn more about career education programs, transferring from a California community college to a saved spot at a four-year university, financial aid opportunities and more. Click the link below to go there now.


                        Continue to I Can Go to College site






                    Skip to content
                





                Skip to content
            





  


  











    








                    Colleges
                





                    Find a Career
                





                    Transfer
                

  






                                                                                          Transfer Opportunities
                                                                                  

                                  Guarantee your saved spot at a four-year university while earning a degree
                              






                                                                                          Try Our Transfer Tool
                                                                                  

                                  Plan your transfer from community college to a university while earning a degree
                              






                                                                                          HBCU Transfer Opportunities
                                  
                                                                                  

                                  Our program guarantees admission to 37 Historically Black Colleges and Cniversities.
                              







                    Degrees & Certificates
                

  






                                                                                          Career Education Certificates
                                  
                                                                                  

                                  Training and certification from the nation's largest career education provider
                              






                                                                                          Associate Degrees
                                  
                                                                                  

                                  Increase your earning power and learn new skills with a college degree
                              






                                                                                          Associate Degree for Transfer
                                  
                                                                                  

                                  Guarantee your place at a four-year university to continue your education
                              






                                                                                          Bachelor's Degree Program
                                  
                                                                                  

                                  Some colleges offer four-year degrees with direct pipelines to employment
                              







                    Financial Aid & Support Services
                

  





Financial Aid



                                                                                                            Financial Aid
                                        
                                                                                                    

                                        Get the money you need to pay for the education you deserve.
                                    






                                                                                                            Promise Grant
                                        
                                                                                                    

                                        Low-income students and those receiving cash assistance may apply for a California College Promise Grant (CCPG).
                                    






                                                                                                            Undocumented
                                        
                                                                                                    

                                        California Dream Act (AB 549 eligible) waives enrollment fees for non-residents.
                                    






Student Support Services



                                                                                                            Student Support Services
                                        
                                                                                                    

                                        Get additional support to help remain focused on your education and your success. Find information on basic needs support services such as food pantries, housing, tutoring and transportation.
                                    






                                                                                                            American Indian and Alaska Native Student Success
                                        
                                                                                                    

                                        Serving American Indian and Alaska Native students with dignity, respect, and intention.
                                    






                                                                                                            Asian American and Pacific Islander Student Success
                                        
                                                                                                    

                                        Supporting Asian American Pacific Islander students from pre- college to college, from college to career, and beyond.
                                    






                                                                                                            Black and African American Student Success
                                        
                                                                                                    

                                        Supporting our Black and African American students on their higher education journey.
                                    






Student Support Services col 2



                                                                                                            Foster Youth Student Success
                                        
                                                                                                    

                                        Financial assistance for books and supplies, transportation, tutoring, food and emergency housing.
                                    






                                                                                                            Hispanic Student Success
                                        
                                                                                                    

                                        Hispanic students can succeed at California Community Colleges.
                                    






                                                                                                            Veteran Student Success
                                        
                                                                                                    

                                        Veterans assistance programs help people returning from active duty.
